title: Native Tongue – Mo’Ju
credit_line: ℗ 2018 Mojo Juju, exclusively licensed to Australian Broadcasting Corporation. (de Luzuriaga / Ma / Seumanutafa)
brief_description: Deceptively simple, Mo’Ju’s ‘Native Tongue’ it uses a single shot of the singer and three Djuki Mala dancers walking through an unmistakably Australian landscape. The glitch effect utilised not only adds visual emphasis to the on-screen movement, but also underlines the poignant lyrics.

constellations_primary.name: Native Tongue
constellations_primary.description: The lead single off her album of the same name, 'Native Tongue' saw artist Mo'Ju explore cultural identity through music, movement and striking visuals.

description: The lead single off their album of the same name, Native Tongue (2018) saw artist Mo’Ju explore cultural identity through music, movement and striking visuals. Deceptively simple, it uses a single shot of Mo’Ju and three Djuki Mala dancers walking through an unmistakably Australian landscape. The glitch effect utilised not only adds visual emphasis to the on-screen movement, but also underlines the poignant lyrics.
